text: Vasya may refer to: * Vasya (crater), a tiny crater on the Moon * Vasya (film), 2002 American documentary film about artist Vasily Sitnikov * Vassya Bankova (Vasya Bankova; born 1954), a Bulgarian chemist == See also == * , a masculine given name * Vasyanovich, a surname * Vasin, a surname derived from Vasya
title: Vasya
